author: kai
msg: IBATIS-389 (Unbalanced # in SQL causes unclear/misleading error message)
- fixed the issue by checking if there are more tokens before fetching the next token, if no more tokens available throw a meaningfull exception

author: rickhall
msg: Applied patch (FELIX-976) to add a command to refresh repository URLs.

author: veithen
msg: Trigger an exception if the VFS transport sender is invoked in an out-in message exchange pattern. Since the transport doesn't support synchronous responses, doing so would leave an entry in Synapse's callback table that would only be released after a (long) delay. Since this entry holds a reference to the message context of the outgoing message this might quickly lead to resource exhaustion. This change forces the user to set the OUT_ONLY property as necessary.

author: veithen
msg: Enhanced the documentation of the VFS transport. In particular added a description of the transport.vfs.Streaming parameter.

author: kai
msg: - added source & target version number (1.5) for the compiler plugin
